Issue.creator: icarrascol
Issue.summary: Update getStateByPartialCompositeKey docs for when using a full key
Issue.description: this functions allows us to query by a partial composite key but i think it should be allowed to query for the full key if we give all the attributes that form it, when i tested for the full composite key using this function i got an empty value. if there is no change to this method i think it needs to be specified in the documentation that we cant do a full key query
